name: Notes of Hearts
summary: In a world of fantasy and magic, you are a rising strategician unraveling the mysterious magical events occurring all over the world. You are free to choose your gender as well as your species, which ranges from Human, Canine, Feline, Avian, Dragon and Fae. You will meet many characters, most of which anthropomorphic in your adventure who you may befriend or seek a deeper connection with. There are multiple romance options not bound by species or gender.
